title: Elegant Minneapolis Airport Stay with Restaurant, Games Lounge & Complimentary Airport Shuttle
description: Experience the heart of the Twin Cities with a stay at the InterContinental Minneapolis - St.Paul Airport, an IHG Hotel. Explore the world-renowned Mall of America, enjoy a performance at the Guthrie Theater and relish in the convenience of direct airport access. At the hotel, savour French-inspired cuisine with a Minnesotan twist at La Voya Brasserie or challenge your travel companions to a game of foosball or pool at Bradstreet Crafthouse, the onsite games lounge.
location_description: InterContinental Minneapolis - St.Paul Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 5005 Glumack Drive, Minneapolis, Minnesota 55450, United States
